fields.title: Bicycle Repair
fields.description: Come learn how to change a tire, tighten tension chords, and fix your brakes. Bring your bike and we will do some hands-on repairs at the shop!

fields.title: Cheap and Healthy Meal Prep
fields.description: We will be hosting a meal prep class at our lodge so we can support our canned food drive. The class will focus on quick, easy, and affordable meal prep work for busy people on a budget. Our veteran kitchen lead will be teaching you yummy meals that your kids will love! Free with the cost of one canned good per person. All ages welcome.

fields.title: Fix a Flat
fields.description: Edward, one of our long term volunteers, will be leading a class on how to change a flat tire. The class will cover the tools you need, where to buy them, and how to change a tire with variations for different abilities and vehicles. The event will be held in our back parking lot and is free to all ages.

fields.title: Learn Spanish: Beginner
fields.description: Spanish for beginners! Open to all.
